text: Someone Like You is a 2001 American romantic comedy movie directed by Tony Goldwyn and based on the 1998 novel Animal Husbandry by Laura Zigman. It stars Ashley Judd, Ellen Barkin, Greg Kinnear, Hugh Jackman, Marisa Tomei, Laura Regan, Peter Friedman and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:2001 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies
title: Someone Like You (movie)
